description: This table contains the history of different activities associated with the member.

columns.name: BENEFIT_USAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the benefit usage record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The date when benefit usage is recorded.

columns.name: BENEFIT_USG_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of usage record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


New Member


Renew Member


Deactivate Membership


Event


Benefit Usage


Card Request


Card Issued

columns.name: BENEFIT_DATE
columns.description: The date when the benefit is used.

columns.name: BENEFIT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the benefit record that is used.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: The start date for the benefit usage.

columns.name: EXP_DATE
columns.description: The end date for the benefit usage.

columns.name: DEACT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for deactivating the membership/benefit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CARD_REQ_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for requesting new card.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
